reviews.review_text: Very un- authentic food. Biryani is equal to colored rice. Terrible mutton pieces and taste. Avoid this place.

We had murg mussalm it was very tasty and the quantity was really good üëç, all off their outlet is good for tasty food, cost is also genuine. I came with my friends for IBW 2024 and visited here, will definitely visit next time again whenever I came to gao.

They don't accept card despite saying that they do when I arrived. The atm is 1 hour round trip. I told them I would pay them in the morning as the roads are dangerous to walk at night. They wouldn't accept and I asked for the police to be called as it was their fault. As I didn't want hassle i paid for cab to atm. The food was like dog food and they overcharged me as I'm foreign like everywhere In India that's why there's no tourists. Avoid at all costs.
